ModMetaData.name: [O21] Rimhammer 40K (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Neronix17
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/WAEzk68.png[/img] Update of Neronix17s mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1513943591 with their permission
Neronix17 is currently working on a reworked version of this mod that is scheduled to be released in the summer of 2021
- The story-framework the original mod used is not updated yet, so that part is disabled for now - Since some parts of the mod depended on removed features they had to be remade, hopfully without errors - I have personally no experience with the Warhammer 40K universe so any questions regarding the lore I leave to the fans to answer
[img]https://i.imgur.com/7Gzt3Rg.png[/img]
[table] [tr] [td][url=https://invite.gg/Mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/O21Rimhammer40K][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/NOW7jU1.png[/img] [h1]Rimhammer 40K mod for Rimworld[/h1] Adds objects, factions and more from the WarHammer universe.
[h1]Credits[/h1] [list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/durge13/myworkshopfiles/?appid=294100]Neronix17 - Mostly of the code, and some textures. [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198087553011/myworkshopfiles/?appid=294100]Ods - Hairs from mod [Ods] Mens Hair , and many of the art assets, primarily pawn equipment and races themselves. [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/krnoel85/myworkshopfiles/]KinKade - Many textures and some of the XML code, primarily structures, security and other buildings, along with creatures and some of the pawn equipment and races. [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198053225215/myworkshopfiles/?appid=294100]Krysismode - Helps a lot with brainstorming, moderating and generally being a great guy. [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561197973673941/myworkshopfiles/?appid=294100]Albion - Provided a large chunk of the C # code that was the original basis for the conversion pods. Check out his amazing Sparkling Worlds - Full Mod! [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/chickenplcker/myworkshopfiles/?appid=294100]Chicken Pluckston - Hair assets, can be found for non Imperial Guard humans here along with other mods he has made. CP has also provided quite a few other assets to the mod including map icons and help with balancing. [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/Syrchalis/myworkshopfiles/?appid=294100]Syrchalis - Recaf Leaf textures. [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198021336326/myworkshopfiles/?appid=294100]Rikiki[/url] - MiningCo Mods . [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/spdskatr/myworkshopfiles/?appid=294100]Spdsktr[/url] - Project RimFactory. [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/erdelf/myworkshopfiles/?appid=294100]erdelf - Humanoid Alien Races 2.0 . [/list]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Rs6T6cr.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=818773962]HugsLib[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [/list]
